lead_paragraph: A friendly between Belgium and Portugal set for next Tuesday was moved from Brussels to the Portuguese city Leiria because of the deadly attacks on Tuesday in Brussels.
snippet: A friendly between Belgium and Portugal set for next Tuesday was moved from Brussels to the Portuguese city Leiria because of the deadly attacks on Tuesday in Brussels.
abstract: Preseason match between Belgium and Portugal is moved from Brussels to Leiria, Portugal, because of Brussels terror attacks.
